explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the application of the Theory of Inventive Problem Solving (TRIZ) in supply chain management (SCM) within petrochemical projects. It discusses the classification of innovations using TRIZ principles and their applicability in SCM. There is no mention or relevance to any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models listed in the provided keywords. The study is centered on innovation management and SCM, not on data-driven or AI-based approaches.
